name: HOODSTOMPING
description:
Stomp your cutie-tocks on some idiot drivers by using your new magboot branded max-impact sustaining boots and score higher the longer you stay in the air. As it gets later in the night the traffic moves more freely making it harder to get your stomp on. 

[space] is the button you need for jumping and restarting and [esc] will take you back to the menu.

HOODSTOMPING is a score attack game done for the cyberpunk jam. This is my first completely released game and it's been a great experience working with so many kickass creative people over the 10 (11) days of the cyberpunk jam. Big thanks to the people who directly contributed to the project. Rimon Bar for helping me with animation and Tommy Fullerton for the last minute music assist.

All money donated will go directly to the itch.io marketplace who run jams like this all the time and have made this site for indie developers to showcase their stuff in a super ethical and very professional way. Consider chucking in 5$ for the cause.

Thanks!

Windows users

Just download the windows version, extract the .zip and run the exe file.

OSX users

Just download the mac Application and run it

Linux users

You will need to install love first, please run:

Debian based systems:

> sudo apt-get install love

Fedora based systems:

> sudo yum install love

Then once you have download the *NIX version of HOODSTOMPING you can use love like so:

> love HOODSTOMPING.love

If you have any issues installing please contact me on twitter and I'll help you out! (my phone usually squeaks cutely in the case of @ twitter messages)
